info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: "An exquisite stay! The location was truly elegant, offering a serene atmosphere and easy access to attractions. The amenities provided were more than sufficient, catering to every need during my stay. The cleanliness was impeccable, a testament to the care and attention given to maintaining the place. The host was exceptionally caring, ensuring a wonderful experience. I highly recommend this well-maintained gem for anyone seeking a delightful retreat."
